properties.name: La I SPA for consciousness
properties.description: Posted by Roundworld5Costa Azul, Uruguay\'LA I\' International Isha Center, Uruguay #843910 - 03/24/07 04:34 PM View in Google Earth View in Google Maps (43 downloads) Edit post Edit Reply to this post Reply Reply to this post Quote Quick Reply Quick Reply Isha\'s new Centre for Enlightenment opens its doors to the world "La I" is open all year round for newcomers and advanced students alike. Come and learn the Isha System, or design your own spiritual retreat, from a few days to a few months, to suit your needs and schedule. In "La I", the beautiful new headquarters of Isha\'s international Foundation, you will find the perfect place to go inwards and wake up to your true self. Through the Isha System, a practical method that mechanically expands and actually stabilizes consciousness, begin the journey back home, to your heart, in an environment especially designed to make of your inner growth a more comfortable and joyful experience. "La I" Uruguay offers a new concept in vacations. A visit to "la I" is not about escaping from life, or "getting away from it all"; it is about returning; coming back home, to your Self. The Isha Masters, a group of exceptional individuals who have dedicated their lives to their own enlightenment and the manifestation of a unified world, are ready to accompany you 24 hours a day on your journey. Thanks to our intensive Teacher Training Program, they have stabilized a deep level of inner peace and freedom, giving them the direct experience of what we all search for with such yearning. This experience allows them to fully support you in your growth, not with ideas, concepts, or canned responses, but with vibrant clear reflections of the perfection they perceive within you. From the moment you arrive until the time of your departure, "La I" will embrace you, enveloping you in its bright open spaces and warm interiors, the perfect place to explore your inner self, and dive deep into ever expanding waves of awareness. Perched above the bay at Costa Azul, Uruguay, "La I" is a esthetically delightful, bursts of natural light and expansive ocean views creating the perfect natural backdrop for the minimalistic and clean Zen lines of "La I". Come to "La I" . Come home, to your heart. Let us serve you on your journey into enlightenment. "La I" is open all year round for newcomers and advanced students alike. Come and learn the Isha System, or design your own spiritual retreat, from a few days to a few months, to suit your needs and schedule. • CONTACT INFORMATION Coordination: Kavali Isha Phone: (598) 373 6994 - (598) 96 579 223 E-mail: reservations@isha.com
